base edition: PCG 08, 71 (R. Kassel - C. Austin, 1995)
other edition: ed.pr.

Greek text in Unicode


    gu gu gu anhr anhr
    Arxontides Xrusis Isidwras Elpidas Xruseras


            γυ’             γυ’                 γυ’1             ανηρ’             ανηρ’2
    ʼ Αρχοντίδες     Χρυσίς     ʼ Ισιδωρᾶς3     ʼ Ελπίδας     Χρυσερᾶ[ς4


n. 01   γυ’ Austin-Kassel : γυ ed.pr.
n. 02   ανηρ’ Austin-Kassel : ανηρ ed.pr.
n. 03   ʼ Ισιδωρᾶς Austin-Kassel : vel ʼ Ισιδώρα corr Austin-Kassel : ισιδωρασ P
n. 04   Χρυσερᾶ[ς suppl Austin-Kassel : Χρυσερα̣[ ed.pr.
contents: list of characters of a comedy?
statepreservation: one papyrus strip (20.1 x 3.3 cm) preserving  a single line of writing (19.5 cm maximum preserved width). Lower margin is ca. 2 cm; no upper or right-hand margin have been preserved; left-hand margin is 0.5 cm.
lectionalsigns: abbreviation by suspension in the supralinear annotations (with abbreviation mark, although the oblique stroke appearing to the right of the abbreviated word can also be found to the right of the word when written in full). Blank spaces separating words in line. Possible morphological mistake (or is the annotation itself above the name mistaken?)
hand: generously sized formal mixed; roughly bilinear, although letters do not sit very uniformly with relation to each other, quite carefully executed
